name: ThemeParkInternational-WeeklyNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to weekly theme park news updates from your favourite source. Introducing Theme Park International - Weekly News, your unofficial source to all things theme parks! Our brand new flash briefing service will bring you all of the latest theme park news straight to your home in a whole new way!

We would love to hear your feedback. Please review us here on Amazon or email us with your feedback, via: internationalthemepark@gmail.com. We hope that you enjoy using our Theme Park Weekly News service.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
